text: @elonmusk @Tesla Hey Elon, In India ventilator shortage problem is here in the hospitals to treat Covid-19 patients. Only 57,000 ventilators are available in indian hospitals. Can you help to shipping your extra ventilators to India?

domain.name: Person

domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands
